cnd16:2.2: Okanjahanti rupadhatuya yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha ye upayupadana cetaso adhitthanabhinivesanusaya, te buddhassa bhagavato pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
cnd16:2.7: vinnanadhatuya yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha ye upayupadana cetaso adhitthanabhinivesanusaya, te buddhassa bhagavato pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
cnd16:3.3: Sa tanha buddhassa bhagavato chinna ucchinna samucchinna vupasanta patippassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddha.
cnd16:3.6: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
cnd16:3.7: Sa eja tanha buddhassa bhagavato pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
cnd16:3.9: Ejaya pahinatta anejo bhagava labhepi na injati, alabhepi na injati, yasepi na injati, ayasepi na injati, pasamsayapi na injati, nindayapi na injati, sukhepi na injati, dukkhepi na injati na calati na vedhati na pavedhati na sampavedhatiti.
cnd16:4.2: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
cnd16:4.3: Sa nandi sa tanha buddhassa bhagavato pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
cnd16:4.5: Oghatinnanti bhagava kamogham tinno bhavogham tinno ditthogham tinno avijjogham tinno sabbasamsarapatham tinno uttinno nitthinno atikkanto samatikkanto vitivatto.
cnd16:4.6: So vutthavaso cinnacarano …pe… jatimaranasamsaro natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
cnd16:4.8: Vimuttanti bhagavato raga cittam muttam vimuttam suvimuttam, dosa cittam … moha cittam …pe…
cnd16:5.6: Buddhassa bhagavato tanhakappo pahino ditthikappo patinissattho.
cnd16:5.7: Tanhakappassa pahinatta ditthikappassa patinissatthatta tasma buddho kappanjaho.
cnd16:5.8: Abhiyaceti yacami abhiyacami ajjhesami sadiyami patthayami pihayami jappami abhijappami.
cnd16:5.10: Ya panna pajanana …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammaditthi.
cnd16:5.11: Bhagava imaya medhaya pannaya upeto samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannagato.
cnd16:6.3: Bhagava agum na karotiti nago, na gacchatiti nago, na agacchatiti nago …pe… evam bhagava na gacchatiti nago.
cnd16:6.4: Sutvana nagassa apanamissanti itoti tuyham vacanam byappatham desanam anusasanam anusittham sutva sunitva uggahetva upadharayitva upalakkhayitva ito apanamissanti vajissanti pakkamissanti disavidisam gamissantiti—
cnd16:9.2: Nanajanati khattiya ca brahmana ca vessa ca sudda ca gahattha ca pabbajita ca deva ca manussa ca.
cnd16:9.3: Janapadehi sangatati anga ca magadha ca kalinga ca kasiya ca kosala ca vajjiya ca malla ca cetiyamha ca vamsa ca kurumha ca pancala ca maccha ca surasena ca assaka ca avantiya ca yona ca kamboja ca.
cnd16:10.3: Bhagava viriyavati viro, pahuti viro, visaviti viro, alamattoti viro, vigatalomahamsotipi viro.
cnd16:12.1: Tava vira vakyam abhikankhamanati tuyham vacanam byappatham desanam anusasanam anusittham.
cnd16:12.2: Abhikankhamanati abhikankhamana icchamana sadiyamana patthayamana pihayamana abhijappamanati—
cnd16:13.2: Tesanti tesam khattiyanam brahmananam vessanam suddanam gahatthanam pabbajitanam devanam manussanam.
cnd16:13.4: Sadhu viyakarohiti sadhu acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehiti—
cnd16:14.1: Tatha hi te vidito esa dhammoti tatha hi te vidito tulito tirito vibhuto vibhavito esa dhammoti—
cnd16:14.2: tatha hi te vidito esa dhammo.
cnd16:15.4: Tatha hi te vidito esa dhammo”ti.
cnd16:17.3: Taya tanhaya rupam adiyanti upadiyanti ganhanti paramasanti abhinivisanti.
cnd16:17.13: vattam adiyanti upadiyanti ganhanti paramasanti abhinivisanti.
cnd16:17.15: Adanatanham vinayetha sabbanti sabbam adanatanham vinayeyya pativinayeyya pajaheyya vinodeyya byantikareyya anabhavam gameyyati—
cnd16:19.1: Yam yanhi lokasmimupadiyantiti yam yam rupagatam vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam adiyanti upadiyanti ganhanti paramasanti abhinivisanti.
cnd16:20.1: Teneva maro anveti jantunti teneva kammabhisankharavasena patisandhiko khandhamaro dhatumaro ayatanamaro gatimaro upapattimaro patisandhimaro bhavamaro samsaramaro vattamaro anveti anugacchati anvayiko hoti.
cnd16:20.2: Jantunti sattam janam naram manavam posam puggalam jivam jagum jantum indagum manujanti—
cnd16:23.2: Tasmati tasma tankarana tamhetu tappaccaya tamnidana, etam adinavam sampassamano adanatanhayati—
cnd16:23.4: Pajananti jananto pajananto ajananto vijananto pativijananto pativijjhanto “sabbe sankhara anicca”ti …pe…
cnd16:23.5: “yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti jananto pajananto ajananto vijananto pativijananto pativijjhanto.
cnd16:23.6: Na upadiyethati rupam nadiyeyya na upadiyeyya na ganheyya na paramaseyya nabhiniviseyya;
cnd16:23.16: vattam nadiyeyya na upadiyeyya na ganheyya na paramaseyya nabhiniviseyyati—
cnd16:24.2: Bhikkhuti puthujjanakalyanako va bhikkhu, sekkho va bhikkhu.
cnd16:24.7: Kincananti kinci rupagatam vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam.
cnd16:24.8: Sabbaloketi sabbaapayaloke sabbamanussaloke sabbadevaloke sabbakhandhaloke sabbadhatuloke sabbaayatanaloketi—
cnd16:25.1: Adanasatte iti pekkhamanoti adanasatta vuccanti ye rupam adiyanti upadiyanti ganhanti paramasanti abhinivisanti;
cnd16:25.11: vattam adiyanti upadiyanti ganhanti paramasanti abhinivisanti.
cnd16:25.13: Pekkhamanoti pekkhamano dakkhamano dissamano passamano olokayamano nijjhayamano upaparikkhamanoti—
cnd16:26.2: Pajati sattadhivacanam maccudheyya vuccanti kilesa ca khandha ca abhisankhara ca.
cnd16:26.3: Paja maccudheyye maradheyye maranadheyye satta visatta asatta lagga laggita palibuddha.
cnd16:26.4: Yatha bhittikhile va nagadante va bhandam sattam visattam asattam laggam laggitam palibuddham, evameva paja maccudheyye maradheyye maranadheyye satta visatta asatta lagga laggita palibuddhati—
